description: a(1) = 1, a(n) = number obtained by replacing each digit of a(n-1) by three times its value.
comments: Number of digits of each term in this sequence is sequence A000930. [From _Dmitry Kamenetsky_, Jan 17 2009]
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 13 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), May 14 2001
